They were a group of three with Igor between them as Summer and Freddie faced each other.

*“Hi,”* said Freddie.

*“How are you?”*

*“I’m Harold.”*

*“It’s a beautiful day outside.”*

*“I think we may have met before.”*

*“No,”* said Summer. *“We haven’t.”*

*“Oh, well, it’s a pleasure any way.”*

*“Have a great day.”*
